attributes.action: Consider Care for People That Are Under Priverlidged.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people in society are under Priverlidged  and not able to maintain an acceptable standard of cleanliness and attitude. People in this category should be offered help in the home and encouraged to be respectful to other people in the community. 

Failing that,  people that continually abuse the social system should be warned that if things did not improve, in the very near future, they would have their children taken from them and placed with foster parents.
